string-array.name: introduction_list_body
string-array.item: This is the new version of FIIMaterials Project. You can easily find recent materials because the project started in 2020. You can also find useful resources and links. There is a rating system for classes and you can make an idea about them.

The first year is complete. The purpose is to have all materials here on this site. I try to make the process as easy as possible: one package, Mega for storing the files and a mobile app. Thanks for all who are helping me with these materials.

It\'s Open Source\", \"I\'ve decided to make the project public, so if you are curios how this project works you can check the GitHub repositories, I make one for every part of it: frontend, backend, mobile. Right now the project it\'s not open for contributions.
